title: [Self-Directed] University Course Satisfaction Survey Bias Analysis Basics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Social studies curriculum conducted in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of instructional design elements (content, methodology, workload) on satisfaction surveys
Identify potential biases when interpreting correlations between student performance and satisfaction responses
Explain the concept of Generative Uncertainty for data-driven educational improvement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
